docs.title: Quantitative Theory
docs.text: This package supports momentum-driven medium-term option strategies.

docs.title: Momentum Windows
docs.text:
• Short SMA: 20–50 days
  • Long SMA: 100–200 days
  • Volatility filters: 20–60 days
  • Momentum (ROC): 63 days
  • RSI: 21–30 days

docs.title: Strategy Extensions
docs.text:
• Realized vs Implied Volatility for options
  • Cross-sectional momentum across assets
  • Tail risk monitoring via skew & kurtosis
